caption.p: Different activities of Moroccan Mentha species essential oils and extracts.

tr.td:
Gram+:
Mycobacterium smegmatis : MIC = 0.12%; MBC = 0.12%,
Mycobacterium aurum : MIC = 0.03%; MBC = 0.03%
Total inhibition of growth and sporulation
Penicillium italicum : Mycelium growth inhibition = 23.60% for plant powder at 10%
DPPH test: scavenging activity = 88% for a concentration of EO of 60.00 μl/mL
DPPH test: IC50 = 20.17 ± 1.88 mg/mL; Reducing power test: IC50 = 92.25 ± 1.32 mg/mL

DPPH test: IC50 = 321.41 ± 2.53 μg/mL;
Reducing power test: IC50 = 58.27 ± 2.72 μg/mL
Tribolium castaneum (young adults): - Contact bioassay: IC50 = 0.05 μl/cm 2; - Fumigant bioassay: IC50 = 24.58 μl/l of air
Sitophilus oryzae (adults): IC100 (4 days) = 2.00 μl/l of air
Agar diffusion and broth micro-dilution assay

Mycelium growth inhibition at [EO] = 0.75%:
Trichophyton mentagrophytes : 91.45 ± 3.08%,
Trichophyton tonsurans : 90.80 ± 2.18%,
Trichophyton violaceum : 90.91 ± 2.14%
α-Amylase: IC50 = 101.72 ± 1.86 μg/mL, α-Glucosidase: IC50 = 86.93 ± 2.43 μg/mL
HIV virus : inhibition of 50% of reverse transcriptase at [Extract] = 100 μg/mL
Extract in organic solvents and H 2O

Gram+:
Staphylococcus aureus ,
Staphylococcus simulans ,
Staphylococcus saprophyticus and
Enterococcus sp and
Bacillus anthracis : MICs ranging between 0.69 and 5.55 ppm,
Gram-:
Escherichia coli ,
Klebsiella pneumoniae ,
Pseudomonas aeruginosa ,
Pseudomonas fluorescens ,
Proteus mirabilis ,
Enterobacter avium ,
Citrobacter freundii : MICs ranging between 0.34 and 5.55 ppm
Agar diffusion method and microtitration method

Candida albicans : MICs ranging between 0.34 and 5.55 ppm;
Candida glabrata MICs ranging between 0.69 and 2.77 ppm

fn.p: IZ = Inhibition Zone, MIC = Minimal Inhibitory Concentration, MBC = Minimal Bactericidal Concentration, IC50 = half maximal inhibitory concentration, EO = Essential Oil.
